basics.label: Marketing Manager
basics.summary: To use my skills, knowledge and enthusiasm to advance the public image and credibility of a business-driven company, in a manner consistent with its existing core values. Almost twenty years of experience in providing top-quality customer service, office management, Marketing, and public relations both for private corporations and non-profit organizations. This includes the ability to execute a successful event or project from vision to completion.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Drive strategic marketing planning as well as tactical execution for the 6 regions. Work with Executive, Sales, and Engineer teams. Managed Marketing Department staffing and Market Development Funds.
highlights: Built relationships with regional marketing, sales, and technology vendors
Pursued and coordinated sponsorship, speaking, tradeshow and event opportunities
Utilized CRM to execute effective marketing programs
Provided input and insight into large, complex sales pursuits and written proposals

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed seven successful special events, increased community involvement and support, managed activities of 90 volunteers, reported directly of 2 administrative assistants, managed bank transactions and special event software, public relations and event contact for organizations.
highlights: Interacted with FHS administrators and lead community volunteers
Managed event ticket sales, reservations, and registration
Research and cultivated prospective event sponsors

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed 200 performances a year in 3 different theaters, managed a team, provided financial and statistical reports, managed database using ArtSoft and initiated website and online ticket sales.
highlights: Assisted with the creation of promotional advertising

certificates.name: One of 4 Marketing Managers chosen in 2015 for a National 9 Month Training
